mapper.insert: insert into recipe_reply (replynum, recipenum, reply, userid) values(seq_recipe_replynum.nextval, #{recipenum}, #{reply}, #{userid})
mapper.update: update recipe_reply set reply = #{reply}, updatedate = sysdate where replynum = #{replynum}
mapper.select: select count(recipenum) from recipe_reply where recipenum = #{recipenum}
